job_details.degree_required: BA/BS in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field, or equivalent knowledge acquired by work experience and training.

jd: Job Description -Need LocalsSr. Database Administrator (W2) Hybrid- St. Philadelphia, PA but candidate must live in the PA, NJ, DE area (No exceptions), and must be commutable to the officeUSC/GC only SkypeJDQualifications:• BA/BS in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field, or equivalent knowledge acquired by work experience and training.• Industry-recognized technical certification preferred (e.g. SQL, MCDBA)• Working Knowledge of database file structure, retrieval and access methods, and performance analysis. Demonstrated analytical skills, excellent written and verbal communication skills, judgment, and the ability to work effectively with clients and IT associates in a collaborative and cooperative manner. Basic Understanding of the development process and business process.• 10+ years’ related IT experience working as a SQL Server database administrator and familiarization with related technologies and tools.• The candidate should have Database Development experience in large scale environments with high transaction volumes such as ecommerce or banking.
